description: Current and avg. KPI-s. Expects 'get_load_average' and 'backends'  helpers to be installed on the monitored DB.

targets.query: select last("in_recovery_int") FROM "wal" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(365d) fill(none)
SELECT last("idleintransaction") FROM "backends" WHERE ("dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(15m) fill(none)
select sum("last") from (select last("non_active_int") FROM "replication_slots" WHERE  $timeFilter group by "dbname", "slot_name")

SELECT (non_negative_derivative(mean("xact_rollback")) / (non_negative_derivative(mean("xact_commit")) + non_negative_derivative(mean("xact_rollback"))) * 100) FROM "db_stats" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT last("idleintransaction") FROM "backends" WHERE ("dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(15m) fill(none)

panels.description:
Transactions per Second.
<0.1 % Error / < 1.0 Warn thresholds by default

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("xact_commit"), 1s) + non_negative_derivative(last("xact_rollback"), 1s) FROM "db_stats" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

panels.title: TPS (avg.)

panels.description:
Queries per Second.
< 0.1 Error / < 1 Warning thresholds by default

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("calls"), 1s) FROM "stat_statements_calls" WHERE $timeFilter AND "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

panels.title: QPS (avg.)

targets.query: select mean(q) from (SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("total_time")) / non_negative_derivative(mean("calls")) as q FROM "stat_statements" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY queryid, time($__interval) fill(none)) group by time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT count("event") FROM "configuration_changes" WHERE ("dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(365d) fill(none)
SELECT count("event") FROM "table_changes" WHERE ("dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(365d) fill(none)
SELECT count("event") FROM "index_changes" WHERE ("dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(365d) fill(none)
SELECT count("event") FROM "sproc_changes" WHERE ("dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(365d) fill(none)
select sum(diff) from (SELECT last("size_b")  - first("size_b") as diff FROM "db_stats" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY dbname, time(365d) fill(none))
select sum("last") from (SELECT last("size_b") FROM "db_stats" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(3650d) fill(none))
select sum(last) from (SELECT last("table_size_b") FROM "table_stats" WHERE ("dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d), table_full_name fill(none))
SELECT last("total_relation_size_b") - last("table_size_b") FROM "table_stats" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(365d) fill(none)
select sum("last") from (select last("is_invalid_int") from index_stats where "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/  AND $timeFilter  group by "index_full_name")

select count("count") from (select count("index_def") from (select last("index_def") as "index_def" from index_stats where "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/  and $timeFilter  group by "table_full_name", "index_full_name", "index_def_hash") group by "table_full_name", "index_def_hash") where "count" > 1
select sum(bloat) from (SELECT last("approx_free_space_b") as bloat FROM "table_bloat_approx_summary" WHERE "dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(none))
SELECT mean("last") FROM (SELECT last("seconds_since_last_vacuum") FROM "table_stats" WHERE ("dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/) AND $timeFilter AND  table_size_b >  100000000 GROUP BY time(1h) fill(none))
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("xlog_location_b"), 1s) FROM "wal" WHERE ("dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

select sum("last") from (select last("scans") from (SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("seq_scan"), 1m) as "scans" FROM "table_stats" WHERE ("dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/) AND $timeFilter AND table_size_b > 100000000 GROUP BY time($__interval), table_full_name fill(none)) group by table_full_name)

panels.title: Seq. scans on >100 MB tables per minute (avg.)

targets.query: select max("xmin_age_tx") from  (SELECT last("xmin_age_tx") as "xmin_age_tx" FROM "replication_slots" WHERE ("dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(365d), slot_name fill(none))
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("tup_inserted"), 1m)  FROM "db_stats"  WHERE ("dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("tup_updated"), 1m)  FROM "db_stats"  WHERE ("dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("tup_deleted"), 1m)  FROM "db_stats"  WHERE ("dbname" =~ /^$dbname$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

panels.content: Brought to you by:

list.name: dbname
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "wal", "db_stats" WITH KEY = "dbname" WHERE time > now() - 1h

title: Health-check
